source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_00<tab>Dominiac wants to talk to you about his plans to attract dragons.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_00<tab>聖フィネア連隊の露営地のドミニアクは、ドラゴン族をおびき寄せる計画について話があるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_01<tab>The corpse of the wyvern you slew has been stolen. Margyt is heading the investigation into this worrying theft. Speak with her for more details.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_01<tab>冒険者が倒した<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9CA501 /var>が盗まれた。聖フィネア連隊の露営地の「マーギット」に話しかけ、ドミニアクとともに話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_02<tab>Margyt knows who stole the wyvern corpse: the very same nobleman that stole the dragon tooth from Ayleth. After an attempt at a diplomatic solution, the man has rendered his demands: he wants to lead the operation to attract and slay a dragon using the dead wyvern.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_02<tab>マーギットから、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9CA501 /var>を盗んだ犯人のことを聞いた。聖フィネア連隊の露営地の「ドミニアク」から話を聞き、判断を仰ごう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_03<tab>Much though Dominiac is loath to rob his unit of the glory of slaying the dragon, his duty to the people of Ishgard takes priority. He decides to submit to the thief's ultimatum. Saintrelmaux is still searching for the dragon and was last seen near the Dreaming Dragon. Find him and inform him of the change of leadership.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_03<tab>ドミニアクは、ドラゴン族との戦いを優先し、犯人である貴族の要求を飲むつもりのようだ。クルザス西部高地の臥竜島付近にいる「サントレルモ」に、そのことを伝えよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_04<tab>Saintrelmaux was approached by a nobleman carrying the wyvern corpse claiming leadership of the operation. A disagreement broke out but was interrupted by an ajattara attack. Both the wyvern corpse and several lives, including the nobleman's, were lost in the attack. Assist Ayleth with the cleanup effort.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_04<tab>サントレルモによると、ドラゴン族の大物、滅竜「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>」が襲来したという。臥竜島付近の「アイレス」と話し、事情を聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_05<tab>Ayleth wants nothing more than to chase the ajattara down and kill it. She asks you to search the area for something─anything that might attract the beast.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_05<tab>アイレスと話した。彼女は<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>を討つ上で役立ちそうな品を見つけていた。貴族が持って逃げようとした「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>」を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_06<tab>Among the wreckage of the ajattara's attack, you find a wyvern bone. Ayleth is hopeful that this will be enough to draw out the ancient Dravanian. Return to Dominiac and apprise him of these serious developments.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_06<tab>ドラゴン族を誘いだすのに役立ちそうな「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>」を回収した。聖フィネア連隊の露営地の「ドミニアク」に、このことを知らせよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_07<tab>Dominiac tells you that word has reached him of an impending Dravanian attack─a vast force sweeping towards the Convictory, led by an ajattara. Dominiac marks a location on your map, near Banepool. He asks you to travel there and use the wyvern bone to draw the Horde's attention long enough for the Convictors to prepare their defenses. Travel to Banepool and distract the attackers, or at least the terrible dragon leading and coordinating the attack.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_07<tab>ドミニアクに報告した。<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>が連隊への報復攻撃を行おうとしているようだ。ドミニアクの立案により、冒険者が<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>を足止めする間に、聖フィネア連隊が邪竜の眷属を撃退することになった。まずは滅竜「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>」をおびき寄せるため、クルザス西部高地のベーンプールにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0B01 /var>」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>」を設置しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_08<tab>You place the wyvern bone at the requested location. With any luck, it should attract the ajattara leading the attack on the Convictory. Lie in wait for it and ambush it when it arrives.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_08<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を設置した。ベーンプールの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0C01 /var>」で待機して、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_09<tab>You have made short work of the ajattara. This has hopefully bought the Convictors the time they needed to prepare for the Dravanian onslaught. Recover the wyvern bone, lest it attract more dragons.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_09<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>を討伐した。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>」を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_10<tab>You have recovered the wyvern bone. Report back to Dominiac.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_10<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を回収した。聖フィネア連隊の露営地の「ドミニアク」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>」を届けよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_11<tab>Your battle with the ajattara bought enough time for the Convictors to mount a successful defense against the now-leaderless Dravanian attack. Dominiac hopes that this victory will draw the Holy See's attention to the importance of what allowed this victory: the strong cooperation between the front lines and their supporting forces. He hopes that this might lead to a change in the way the Convictors fight, going from a group of paupers and outcasts, squabbling for credit and recognition, to an elite, organized fighting unit. He suggests that you find Ayleth and Saintrelmaux. They will be glad to know that your fight went well and that you are unharmed.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_11<tab>ドミニアクに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を届け、今回の計画が、聖フィネア連隊の地位向上を狙ったものだったという話を聞いた。彼は、アイレスとサントレルモにも声をかけてほしいという。聖フィネア連隊の露営地にいる「アイレス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_12<tab>Seeing a signet ring Ayleth carries, Saintrelmaux explains how he was born into nobility and that the ring bears his house's crest. Ayleth received the ring from a woman she cared for after the Calamity─Saintrelmaux's mother. The two realize that─despite their different backgrounds─at the Convictory, they are equal. This strengthens their resolve to see Ishgard changed for the better. Relay this uplifting news to Dominiac.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_12<tab>アイレスと話したところ、彼女がサントレルモの母親を看取っていたという、ふたりの意外な縁が判明した。彼らふたりの決意を、聖フィネア連隊の露営地にいる「ドミニアク」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_13<tab>Whether their common ground be coincidence or fate, Dominiac is glad that his troops have come to understand their equal footing. He thanks you again for your assistance in seeing his plan through, and hopes he can find some way to repay you in the future.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SEQ_13<tab>ドミニアクに報告した。これで、ドミニアクの計画はすべて完了した。彼らの戦いは、まだ終わっていない。機会があるならば、また彼の力になるのも悪くないだろう。

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_00<tab>マーギットと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Dominiac.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_01<tab>ドミニアクと話す

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_02<tab>臥竜島付近のサントレルモと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_04<tab>Search the wreckage.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_06<tab>Place the wyvern bone at Banepool.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_06<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0B01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を設置

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_07<tab>Lie in wait for the ajattara.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_07<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0C01 /var>で待機し、現れた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD801 /var>を討伐

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_08<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を回収

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_09<tab>Deliver the bone to Dominiac.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_09<tab>ドミニアクに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_10<tab>Speak with Ayleth.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_TODO_10<tab>アイレスと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_000<tab>Firstly, please, let me apologize. The corpse of the wyvern you slew has been stolen.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_000最初に謝らせてくれ、冒険者殿。
以前、貴公が倒してくれたが、
何者かに盗まれてしまったのだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_001<tab>There's a place─the Dreaming Dragon─that holds great importance to the Dravanians. We placed the body there and waited for a great and powerful dragon, but none appeared. The corpse, however, <var 1A 02 /var>disappeared<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_001ドラゴン族にとって重要な意味を持つという「臥竜島」に、
死骸を置いて、大物が釣れるのを待っていたのだが……。
竜など飛来しておらぬというのに、忽然となくなってな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_002<tab>We can only assume that someone slipped in, under cover of night, and stole it. We're conducting an investigation now. If you'd be willing, we'd greatly appreciate your assistance. Please speak with Margyt for more information.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_002夜陰に紛れた「人」のしわざと考え、調査していたのだが……。
その件について、「マーギット」が情報を持っているらしい。
冒険者殿も、ぜひ一緒に聞いてほしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_015<tab>We're investigating the theft of the wyvern corpse, but we need your help. Please speak with Margyt. She will provide you with further information.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_015夜陰に紛れた「人」のしわざと考え、調査していたのだが……。
その件について、「マーギット」が情報を持っているらしい。
冒険者殿も、ぜひ一緒に聞いてほしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_003<tab>That nobleman really is the worst─stirring up the troops like that.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_003それにしても、あの貴族、最低な奴よね……。
こうも隊をかき乱して……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_010<tab>The investigation into the missing wyvern body? We already know who the bloody thief is.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_010実は……を運び去った者を知っています。
私が露営地の外に出ていたとき、犯人が接触してきたのです！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_011<tab>Do you remember the nobleman that stole the dragon fang from Ayleth? Well, it seems he found out about your plan and is doing what he can to interfere.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_011アイレスからを奪った貴族……
彼みずから、自分の犯行だと名乗り出ました。
「手柄の独占」に対する正当な抗議だと、そう主張しています。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_012<tab>Trying to steal another's achievements is really, truly detestable. But, be that as it may, we plan to try resolving this amicably─through negotiation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_012抗議……。
つまり、自分も作戦に参加させ、手柄をよこせ、ということか？
であれば、私が直接話をつけてくるとしよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_013<tab>In fact, we've talked to the man already...and he's put forth his conditions.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_013いえ、それが……。
すでに、先方から条件を提示してきておりまして。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_014<tab>Hmph. I imagine he wants to be put in charge of the operation, does he?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_014<tab>まさか、作戦の指揮官を自分にしろとでも言ってきたか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_015<tab>Indeed he does. Dominiac, what would you have us do? Know that whatever you decide, you have the entire unit's unwavering support.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_015……そのとおりです。
ドミニアク様、いかがなさいましょうか？
我々は、貴方の判断に従います。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_024<tab>That filthy swine!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_024<tab>あの貴族……本当に心根の腐ったやつね……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_030<tab>This puts us in quite a difficult situation. We can't just let that man take credit for all our hard work, but we also have a duty to fight back against the Dravanian Horde at all cost.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_030つくづく勝手な要求をしてきたものだな！
とはいえ、我らの使命は、己の出世ではなく、
皇都を守るためドラゴン族を討つこと……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_031<tab>I want this victory to belong to the troops that fight under my command, but we also can't let an opportunity like this─an opportunity to slay a great, ancient dragon─pass us by.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_031この際、指揮権のひとつやふたつ、あの貴族にくれてやる！
本当はこの作戦、部下の武勲としてやりたかったのだが……
内輪もめで、みすみす大物を逃すようでは本末転倒だからな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_032<tab>I think we all understand how you feel, Dominiac.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_032<tab>……ドミニアク様のお考えは、理解しているつもりです。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_033<tab>Thank you. That makes this just a little bit easier. We have no choice but to meet his demands.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_033そう言ってくれると助かるよ。
私から件の貴族に、交渉に応じると説明しておこう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_034<tab>I'll meet with this nobleman myself and tell him that we'll agree to his terms. Please find Saintrelmaux and let him know of this development. He has taken command of the unit and is at the Dreaming Dragon leading the search for the slain wyvern.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_034現在、臥竜島に「サントレルモ」が赴き、
を探している。
貴族の件は私に任せ、彼にもこの情報を伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_040<tab>Saintrelmaux is at the Dreaming Dragon leading the search for the slain wyvern. Please find him and let him know that we are agreeing to the nobleman's terms.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_040現在、臥竜島に「サントレルモ」が赴き、
を探している。
貴族の件は私に任せ、彼にもこの情報を伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_45<tab>So eager for glory... Look at them now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_45<tab>……これが、功を焦った者の末路。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_050<tab>Gods, it's all gone to hells!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_050<tab>冒険者さん、大変なんだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_051<tab>Some idiot nobleman came up claiming to be in charge of the unit! He had the wyvern corpse with him! But before I could tell him what I thought of his claims─
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_051馬鹿な貴族が「指揮権は自分に移った」と言って、
をここに運んできたんだ！
それで、それで……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_052<tab>Hm. I see. Well, that explains who the nobleman was and why he thought he was in charge. Dominiac <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the type who would yield control if it meant slaying a dragon.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_052……なるほど。
ドミニアクさんは、ドラゴン族を倒すためなら、
指揮権くらい譲ってもかまわないと言ったのか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_053<tab>Unfortunately, I fear the situation may have been complicated somewhat. For you see, while he and I were arguing, a huge, monstrous dragon swooped down─an ajattara, I think it was.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_053だが……手後れだよ。
件の貴族たちと、僕らが言い争っている間に、
「滅竜」のふたつ名を持つドラゴン族「」が飛来したんだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_054<tab>Well, it had killed the nobleman before I could blink. And as soon as it had arrived, it was flying away─with the dead wyvern in its claws. Ayleth is addressing the aftermath. Do you think you could lend her a hand?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_054は、あっという間に貴族たちを殺すと、
をつかみ上げ、飛び去っていったよ。
……後始末をしてる「アイレス」からも、話を聞いてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_060<tab>That bloody idiot nobleman has ruined our─ No, it's just a setback. We can't give up so easily.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_060馬鹿のせいで、計画は失敗か……。
いや、まだ諦めるわけにはいかないね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_70<tab>This corpse was the nobleman that tricked me. He turned tail─tried to save himself.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_70……そこに横たわってるのが、私を騙した貴族。
自分だけ助かろうと、敵に背中を見せた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_71<tab>He tried to make off with a dragon bone. See if you can't find it. If you do, take it back to Dominiac.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_71彼が持って逃げようとしたのが、そこにある「」。
を誘いだすのに、きっと使える。
回収して、「ドミニアク」様へ報告、お願い。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_72<tab>So eager for glory... Look at them now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_72<tab>……これが、功を焦った者の末路。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_080<tab>An ajattara attacked the nobleman? Hmmm, that explains it, then.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_080なんと、滅竜「」が飛来し、貴族連中を殺したと！？
……それはまずい！
どうやら例の死骸が、とんでもない大物を呼び寄せたようだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_081<tab>We just received word that a large detachment of the Dravanian Horde is headed towards the Convictory─and they're being led by a large and ancient dragon. It must be a retaliatory attack by the ajattara.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_081実は先ほど、ドラゴン族に率いられた眷属の群れが、
この露営地を目指して、進軍中との情報が寄せられたのだ。
による報復攻撃と見て間違いなかろう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_0823<tab>We must do something about it. But we're not ready to fend off an attack of that size just yet. Perhaps that wyvern bone could attract the ajattara and draw the force it leads away from the Convictory?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_0823……遺憾ながら、我が連隊には、奴を倒せるほどの力はない。
ただ貴公が回収した、その「」は使えそうだ！
はきっと、これを取り戻しにくるはず……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_083<tab>Here, I've placed a mark on your map. Take the bone there and distract the ajattara. That should buy us the time we need to mobilize our forces, strengthen our defenses, and meet the Dravanian Horde head-on!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_083冒険者殿、その骨を地図に記した場所に置き、
の気を引きつけてほしい！
その間に、我らは露営地の防備を固め、眷属を迎え撃つ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_090<tab>Take the wyvern bone to the location I've marked on your map. Use it to distract the ajattara long enough for us to prepare a defense against the Horde! Please hurry!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_090冒険者殿、その骨を地図に記した場所に置き、
の気を引きつけてほしい！
その間に、我らは露営地の防備を固め、眷属を迎え撃つ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_095<tab>Good work! With the time you bought us, we were able to prepare a defense and drive off the Horde's attack. Did you recover the wyvern bone?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_095おお、貴公が時間稼ぎをしてくれている間に、
こちらも総力を挙げ、眷属どもの攻勢をはね除けたぞ！
して、そちらは……はどうなった？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_100<tab>It seems the bone was effective bait. What happened to the ajattara?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_100これは、オトリに使用しただな。
持ち去られても構わんと思っていたが、もしや、貴公……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_101<tab>Hahahaha! Why did I even ask? You only needed to slow the thing down, but I suppose I should have expected no less from the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> that slew the primals.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_101ハッハッハッハッ！
足止めを頼んでみれば、まさか討伐してしまうとは！
さすがは、邪竜狩りを成した英雄ということか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_102<tab>We need to inform the Holy See of what has happened. Both of the...unfortunate accident...that befell one of their nobles, and of the glorious victory over the Dravanian Horde, shared by both yourself and my unit.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_102偶発の事故とはいえ、例の貴族も消えたことだ。
討伐は、冒険者殿と我が隊の共同作戦によるものと、
教皇庁には報告しておこう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_103<tab>I can only hope that this victory will draw attention to the fighting strategy that allowed it─the cooperation between the front line and the logistical troops supporting them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_103前線部隊と後方部隊を連携させる、
我が隊の戦い方は、この武勲で注目を集めるだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_104<tab>It will change the way the Convictors fight! It would make this a place not for fallen nobles and starving paupers to run to, but the home of an elite fighting force gloriously defending Ishgard from the Dravanian onslaught.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_104さすれば聖フィネア連隊は変わる！
落ちぶれ貴族や、食い詰め貧民の逃げ場でなくなり、
竜狩りの精鋭部隊となれば、隊の皆の地位も改善するはずだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_105<tab>Ahhh, so this was your plan all along.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_105<tab>なるほど、それがドミニアク様の狙いだったんですね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_106<tab>This is but one step in a much greater plan. And it was a step that someone like Ser Aymeric─someone far removed from the actual fighting itself─is not able to take. Step by step, we can change Ishgard for the better. That is my goal.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_106これは小さな一歩かもしれない。
だが、上にいるアイメリクにはできない、一歩だ。
この一歩を積み重ね、国を変えていくのが私の役目だ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_107<tab>I will be fighting at your side, Dominiac. For Ishgard, and for you, and more than anything else, for myself.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_107ついていきますよ、ドミニアク様。
イシュガルドのため、あなたのため……
そして何よりも、自分自身のために。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_108<tab>You're loyal, Margyt, and that's a good thing. It's for the loyalty of troops like you that I am here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_108マーギットは素直だな、それでいい。
それでこそ、私がここにいる意味もあるというものだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_109<tab>You know, I don't see Saintrelmaux or Ayleth around. You should probably try and find them; I think they'd be glad to know that you are safe.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_109ところで、「サントレルモ」と「アイレス」の姿が見えんな。
冒険者殿、ぜひあのふたりにも声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_120<tab>It was a very close fight, but we pulled through somehow. If you hadn't taken care of that ajattara, I daresay we'd be dead.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_MARGYT_000_120厳しい戦いだったけど、なんとか勝てたわ。
あなたが、を足止めしてくれたおかげね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_121<tab>I haven't seen Saintrelmaux or Ayleth around. Go and find them. They'll be glad to know that you are safe.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_121「サントレルモ」と「アイレス」の姿が見えないな。
冒険者殿、ぜひあのふたりにも声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_122<tab>You keep looking at your hand, Ayleth. Was it injured in the battle?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_122アイレスが、ずっと手元を見てるんだよね。
なにを見てるんだろう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_200<tab>You keep looking at your hand, Ayleth. What's the matter?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_200何を見ているんだい、アイレス。
冒険者さんも、気にしているよ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_201<tab>It's a ring. It was left to me by a woman I cared for during the aftermath of the Calamity.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_201……指輪を見てた。
第七霊災のあと、雲霧街で看取った女性から、
息絶える前に託された指輪。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_202<tab>She would look at it when she knew she was dying. She told me that seeing it let her know she was still alive.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_202死を意識したときは、いつもこれを見る。
私はまだ死ねない、死にゆく者たちから託されたものが、
私にはたくさんある……そのことを、忘れないように。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_203<tab>Wait─that ring! The seal on the ring, it's the coat of arms of my house! The woman you cared for─that was my mother!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_203ま、待て！
その指輪に刻まれているのは、我が家の紋章！
まさか……アイレスが看取った女性は……母上！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_204<tab>Hm? You're nobility?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_204紋章……？
あなた、貴族なの？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_205<tab>Nobility? No... Well, technically, I suppose I am. My father was a knight in service of House Haillenarte. But after the great failure at the Steel Vigil...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_205……いや「元」貴族さ。
第七霊災の時に、アインハルト家に仕える騎士だった父は、
スチールヴィジルの防衛に失敗してね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_206<tab>After the dishonor of failing in his mission, he was stripped of his rank. The shame was all too great for him and he took his own life. Left with neither money nor prestige, my mother fled. And you, it seems, cared for her at the end.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_206不名誉な敗戦の責任を問われ、爵位を奪われた父は自害……。
財も名誉も失った母は、失意の内に姿を消してしまったんだ。
君が……看取ってくれたのか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_207<tab>But... What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_207そんなことが……
でも、なぜあなたはここに……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_208<tab>To be honest, I came here looking for a noble death. Filled with hatred for Ishgard, for the nobility, for my family... I was ready to give up. But this last great battle has made me reconsider.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_208僕は……端的に言えば、死ぬつもりでここに来たのさ。
国を憎み、階級を憎み、家族を憎み、疲れていたんだ。
ただ、今回の作戦を経て、考えを変えたよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_209<tab>Me too. Growing up in the Brume, I hated all those things and more.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_209……私もそう。
貧民上がりの私は、すべてを憎んでいた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_210<tab>Do you think we can do it? Change Ishgard, that is. A pauper and a nobleman, working together...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_210ねえ、あなたは、この国を変えられると思う？
貴族と平民は、仲良くなれる？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_211<tab>I think we can, one day. But even now, you and I are here together, speaking as equals.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_211……いつか、できるさ。
今こうやって、僕と君が対等に話しているように、ね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_212<tab>Just as I have changed my mind, so too might this nation and its people change. Wouldn't you agree?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_212僕の考えが変わったように、人も国も変わっていくのだから。
ねえ、冒険者さん？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_213<tab>We still have much to work at. One day, those at the bottom will bring about change in those at the top. Until that day, hold on to that ring, Ayleth.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_213……さて、僕たちもひとつひとつ、がんばっていこう。
ドミニアクさんの言う、「下」が「上」を変える日が訪れるまで、
母の指輪は、アイレスに預けておくよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_250<tab>I will fight. My friends are by my side.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_AILETH_000_250仲間と一緒に、がんばる、か……。
仲間、たくさんできて、嬉しい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_255<tab>Even from here at the Convictory, we can change our nation.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_SAINTRELMAUX_000_255<tab>僕も、この場所から、がんばっていこう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_300<tab>What an incredible coincidence. Maybe even fate, perhaps. Whatever it may be, if Saintrelmaux and Ayleth are going to work together for the sake of the future, that's enough for me.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_300……実に、奇妙な巡り合わせがあったのだな。
だが、サントレルモとアイレスが、ともに前を向き、
歩む決意をしてくれたのなら、それで良かったということだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_301<tab>Thank you yet again for all your assistance and cooperation. Margyt is busy taking stock after the battle, but she, too, deeply appreciates all you've done for us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_301冒険者殿、改めて貴公の協力に感謝する。
事後処理に向かったマーギットも、深く感謝していたぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_302<tab>I hear that even Aymeric has expressed his thanks to you. I doubt I can ever fully repay you for all you've done, but if you ever need our help, I will gladly do what I can.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ630_01898_DOMINIAC_000_302アイメリクも、貴公には助けられていると聞く。
これほどの恩を簡単に返せるとは思わんが、
何かあれば、我が命を賭して協力させてもらうぞ！
